texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["A strike by some Tube drivers on the District line is planned on Friday 13 April. If it goes ahead, there will be a reduced service on the District line for all of Friday."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There will be delays to District line journeys throughout the day - please allow more time to complete your journeys or change to a different line if possible.
All other Tube lines will operate as normal. Services on the District line are expected to resume normally on Saturday morning.
The impact is expected to be minimal in central London due to normal service on the Circle line, with regular services between Gloucester Road and Tower Hill.
There will be more time between trains going to all western branches of the District line via Earl's Court and east of Tower Hill.

There will be no services to Kensington Olympia. However, London Overground and Southern services will be calling at the station as usual. TfL Travel Ambassadors will be at key locations to provide travel information and advice.
Keep up-to-date with the latest service information. See:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["This web page, which will be regularly updated","TfL Twitter accounts, including \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/TfLTravelAlerts\"\u003e@TfLTravelAlerts\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/districtline\"\u003e@Districtline\u003c/a\u003e , as well as the \u003ca href=\"http://m.me/tfltravelbot\"\u003eTfL Travelbot\u003c/a\u003e on Facebook messenger"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/plan-a-journey/\"\u003ePlan a journey\u003c/a\u003e can help you plan your route by public transport, cycling or walking","Check the latest \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/\"\u003estatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps?Input=Current+location+\"\u003eNearby \u003c/a\u003e uses your current location or a postcode or address of your choice and places you on a map, showing you Tube, bus, river, Overground, DLR, rail and Santander Cycles locations around you","Sign up to our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/travel-information/social-media-and-email-updates/email-updates\"\u003eemail updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
